TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to James F Perry, 09-27-1832

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, September 27, 1832. Closing his business with the Hawkins estate. Advice about location of a farm.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Brasoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-27-1832">Sept. 27. [1832]*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I am dividing the land with *person_mentioned*Hawkins estate*/person_mentioned*, and shall go to *location_mentioned*San felipe */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-28-1832">tomorrow */date_mentioned*in about *date_mentioned n="10-08-1832">ten days*/date_mentioned* I shall return and run the *location_mentioned*dividing lines*/location_mentioned*— I have left a letter for you with *person_mentioned*James Westall*/person_mentioned* as to the place where you must improve so as not to interfere with the part that *person_mentioned*Hawkins */person_mentioned*gets.*/p*
*p*I am fast getting through my business and before *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1832">spring */date_mentioned*I Will take leave of public matters for the balance of my life— I intend to live principally with you, or near you and go to farming. Love to *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Lavinia*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*What does *person_mentioned*Col Morris */person_mentioned*ask for his improvements*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*land on oyster Creek*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*below Mitchels falls*/location_mentioned* to me in the division, inquire of *person_mentioned*Hodge */person_mentioned*what kind of land it is. I am told that the cane comes to the *location_mentioned*Prairie just below Mitchels line*/location_mentioned*—that would be a good place for a *location_mentioned*farm*/location_mentioned*, and *location_mentioned*not over 12 miles from Pleasant Bayou*/location_mentioned* to go straight, but there would be *location_mentioned*three Creeks*/location_mentioned* to bridge—it would be unhealthy perhaps on *location_mentioned*oyster creek*/location_mentioned* merely inquire of *person_mentioned*Hodge */person_mentioned*generally as to the land—how wide the cane is and how the *location_mentioned*land is for 4 or 5 Miles down the creek below *person_mentioned*Mitchels*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*, without telling him whose it is etc also ask him how the *location_mentioned*land is between oyster creek and Baylies prairie and out side the cane*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. A.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*What do you think *person_mentioned*Col Morris*/person_mentioned* improvement is worth—*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr. James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Pleasant Bayou*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
